```{r}
library(dplyr)
gii_world <- CompData %>%
  select(iso3,
         country,
         gii_2010,
         gii_2019) %>%
  mutate(gii_diff = gii_2010 - gii_2019) %>%
  select(-gii_2019,-gii_2010)
head(gii_world)
tail(gii_world)
```
```{r}
library(countrycode)
country <- function(gii_world, iso3, destination = 'iso2c', nomatch = NA, warn = TRUE) {
    gii_cn <- gii_world[[iso3]]
    out <- countrycode(sourcevar = gii_cn,
                       origin = 'iso3c',
                       destination = destination)
    
    gii_world[[iso3]]<-out
    return(gii_world)
 }
gii_world <- country(gii_world, iso3 = "iso3") 
gii_world <- gii_world %>%
  rename(iso2='iso3')%>%
  filter(!is.na(iso2))%>%
gii_world <- gii_world%>%
  select(-country)
head(gii_world)
```
```{r}
gii_merge <- World %>%
  merge(.,
        gii_world, 
        by.x="ISO", 
        by.y="iso2")%>%
  distinct()
print(gii_merge)
View(gii_merge)
```
